item.title: Fresh Flowers make you smile
item.description:
Fresh Flowers make you smile

There is something so delightful about the sights and smells of fresh flowers; they have the ability to pick you up, transport you, chill you out, smile, remember...

item.title: Pure Rose Oil Cacao
item.description:
Pure Rose Oil Cacao

Rose raw chocolates are so divine...These delightful morsels of loveliness need to be made by your fair hands and eaten with absolute joy! The beautiful recipe is courtesy of John & Noel of Shantistar - thank you x

item.title: Relaxing DIY Bath Salts
item.description:
Relaxing DIY Bath Salts

You too can make some fabulous & therapeutic bath salts...add your favourite essential oil(s), rest back and soak in the delights!

item.title: DIY: Dish Soap with Lemon and Citrus Bliss Oils | doTERRA Essential Oils
item.description:
DIY: Dish Soap with Lemon and Citrus Bliss Oils | doTERRA Essential Oils

Try this do-it-yourself dish soap recipe using Lime, Lemon, and Citrus Bliss essential oils. It is perfect for removing grease and awakening your senses.

item.title: Delicious & healthy stuffed Pita Bread
item.description:
Delicious & healthy stuffed Pita Bread

Ever gone to the kitchen, opened the fridge & just stood in front of the cold opening just staring at the contents blindly thinking "I have nothing to eat!"....? Well that was me the other day, it was ridiculous...

item.title: Calming & Cleansing...Detox Bath Salts
item.description:
Calming & Cleansing...Detox Bath Salts

Here is an alternative to my Lavender Relaxing Bath Salts....This one is divine in smell... both Men and Women like this one - yes it is a little more flowery, but the benefits are one to be enjoyed by all.

item.title: Homemade Loot...itâ€™s all good!
item.description:
Homemade Loot...itâ€™s all good!

There is some amount of great satisfaction in knowing that you made something; that what you have made is from natural organic and easily sourced materials and most importantly it is free from many of those unpleasant toxins and chemicals found in many commercial store bought products.

item.title: About me...
item.description:
About me...

Hi there, I am Amanda (also known as Mandy, Mands, Manda Panda, Mand, MandySue...hey you... and a few more) and am a legal alien now living in Munich, Germany; I love food, coffee, wine and CafÃ© Culture... wholefoods, health & wellness, natural stuff, essential oils, photography....so many things!
